extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Implement application controls to manage and control execution of software, including allowlisting remote access programs. Apply recommendations in CISA's joint Guide to Securing Remote Access Software.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Use of RDP and Remote Desktop Services
extracted_playbook.description: Audit the network for systems using RDP, close unused RDP ports, enforce account lockouts, apply phishing-resistant MFA, log RDP login attempts, and disable command-line and scripting activities.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict and Update PowerShell Usage
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict the use of PowerShell using Group Policy, update to the latest version, enable enhanced logging, and ensure logs have a retention period of at least 180 days.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Windows Registry for PsExec Operations
extracted_playbook.description: Require User Account Control (UAC) approval for any PsExec operations requiring administrator privileges to reduce the risk of lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable File and Printer Sharing Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable File and Printer sharing services. If required, use strong passwords or Active Directory authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement a Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive data in a physically separate, segmented, and secure location. Follow the 3-2-1 backup strategy.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Strong Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to comply with NIST's standards, use longer passwords, store passwords in hashed format, and avoid reusing passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Administrator Credentials for Software Installation
extracted_playbook.description: Require administrator credentials to install software and implement phishing-resistant multifactor authentication for all services.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems Up to Date
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all operating systems, software, and firmware up to date. Patch vulnerable systems within 24 to 48 hours of vulnerability disclosure.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to prevent the spread of ransomware by controlling traffic flows and restricting lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Detect and Investigate Abnormal Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Identify, detect, and investigate abnormal activity with a network monitoring tool. Implement EDR tools for detecting lateral connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Real-Time Antivirus Detection
extracted_playbook.description: Install, regularly update, and enable real-time detection for antivirus software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports to reduce potential attack vectors.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Email Banners for External Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Consider adding an email banner to emails received from outside your organization.
